name.japanese: ライトニングサーフライド

description.sun-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,
attacks the target with full force. This move leaves
the target with paralysis.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,
attacks the target with full force. This move leaves
the target with paralysis.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,
attacks the target with full force. This move leaves
the target with paralysis.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.
